verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and scourged <S%G3146><s%> him.

And the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> platted <S%G4120><s%> a crown <S%G4735><s%> of thorns, <S%G173><s%> and put <S%G2007><s%> it on <S%G2007><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> and they put <S%G4016><s%> on <S%G4016><s%> him a purple <S%G4210><s%> robe, <S%G2440><s%>
And said, <S%G3004><s%> Hail, <S%G5463><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews! <S%G2453><s%> and they smote <S%G1325><s%> <S%G4475><s%> him with their hands. <S%G4475><s%>

Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1854><s%> again, <S%G3825><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Behold, <S%G2396><s%> I bring <S%G71><s%> him forth <S%G1854><s%> to you, that you may know <S%G1097><s%> that I find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> fault <S%G156><s%> in him.

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> forth, <S%G1854><s%> wearing <S%G5409><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of thorns, <S%G174><s%> and the purple <S%G4210><s%> robe. <S%G2440><s%> And Pilate said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Behold <S%G2396><s%> the man! <S%G444><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> and officers <S%G5257><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, they cried <S%G2905><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Crucify <S%G4717><s%> him, crucify <S%G4717><s%> him. Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Take <S%G2983><s%> you him, and crucify <S%G4717><s%> him: for I find <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fault <S%G156><s%> in him.

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, We have <S%G2192><s%> a law, <S%G3551><s%> and by our law <S%G3551><s%> he ought <S%G3784><s%> to die, <S%G599><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
When <S%G3753><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that saying, <S%G3056><s%> he was the more <S%G3123><s%> afraid; <S%G5399><s%>

And went <S%G1525><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the judgment <S%G4232><s%> hall, <S%G4232><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> From where <S%G4159><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him no <S%G3756><s%> answer. <S%G612><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> to him, Speak <S%G2980><s%> you not to me? know <S%G1492><s%> you not that I have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to crucify <S%G4717><s%> you, and have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> you?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> You could have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> at all <S%G3762><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> me, except <S%G1508><s%> it were given <S%G1325><s%> you from above: <S%G509><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> he that delivered <S%G3860><s%> me to you has <S%G2192><s%> the greater <S%G3187><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>

And from thereafter <S%G1537><s%> <S%G5127><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to release <S%G630><s%> him: but the Jews <S%G2453><s%> cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> you let <S%G630><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> man go, <S%G630><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> not Caesar's <S%G2541><s%> friend: <S%G5384><s%> whoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> makes <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G848><s%> a king <S%G935><s%> speaks <S%G483><s%> against <S%G483><s%> Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that saying, <S%G3056><s%> he brought <S%G71><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> forth, <S%G1854><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> down <S%G2523><s%> in the judgment <S%G968><s%> seat <S%G968><s%> in a place <S%G5117><s%> that is called <S%G3004><s%> the Pavement, <S%G3038><s%> but in the Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> Gabbatha. <S%G1042><s%>

And it was the preparation <S%G3904><s%> of the passover, <S%G3957><s%> and about <S%G5616><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> hour: <S%G5610><s%> and he said <S%G3004><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> Behold <S%G2396><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King! <S%G935><s%>

But they cried <S%G2905><s%> out, Away <S%G142><s%> with him, away <S%G142><s%> with him, crucify <S%G4717><s%> him. Pilate <S%G4091><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Shall I crucify <S%G4717><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> King? <S%G935><s%> The chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> We have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> king <S%G935><s%> but Caesar. <S%G2541><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> he him therefore <S%G3767><s%> to them to be crucified. <S%G4717><s%> And they took <S%G3880><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and led <S%G520><s%> him away. <S%G520><s%>

And he bearing <S%G941><s%> his cross <S%G4716><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a place called <S%G3004><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> of a skull, <S%G2898><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1447><s%> Golgotha: <S%G1115><s%>

Where <S%G3699><s%> they crucified <S%G4717><s%> him, and two <S%G1417><s%> others <S%G243><s%> with him, on <S%G1782><s%> either <S%G1782><s%> <S%G2532><s%> side <S%G1782><s%> one, and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> in the middle. <S%G3319><s%>

And Pilate <S%G4091><s%> wrote <S%G1125><s%> a title, <S%G5102><s%> and put <S%G5087><s%> it on <S%G1909><s%> the cross. <S%G4716><s%> And the writing <S%G1125><s%> was JESUS <S%G2424><s%> OF NAZARETH <S%G3478><s%> THE KING <S%G935><s%> OF THE JEWS. <S%G2453><s%>

This <S%G5126><s%> title <S%G5102><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> read <S%G314><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the Jews: <S%G2453><s%> for the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was crucified <S%G4717><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> to the city: <S%G4172><s%> and it was written <S%G1125><s%> in Hebrew, <S%G1447><s%> and Greek, <S%G1676><s%> and Latin. <S%G4513><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> to Pilate, <S%G4091><s%> Write <S%G1125><s%> not, The King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> but that he said, <S%G2036><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> King <S%G935><s%> of the Jews. <S%G2453><s%>
Pilate <S%G4091><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> written. <S%G1125><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had crucified <S%G4717><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> his garments, <S%G2440><s%> and made <S%G4160><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> parts, <S%G3313><s%> to every <S%G1538><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> a part; <S%G3313><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> his coat: <S%G5509><s%> now <S%G1161><s%> the coat <S%G5509><s%> was without <S%G729><s%> seam, <S%G729><s%> woven <S%G5307><s%> from the top <S%G509><s%> throughout. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3650><s%>

They said <S%G2036><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> themselves, <S%G240><s%> Let us not rend <S%G4977><s%> it, but cast <S%G2975><s%> lots <S%G2819><s%> for it, whose <S%G5101><s%> it shall be: that the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> They parted <S%G1266><s%> my raiment <S%G2440><s%> among them, and for my clothing <S%G2441><s%> they did cast <S%G906><s%> lots. <S%G2975><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> things therefore <S%G3767><s%> the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> did. <S%G4160><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there stood <S%G2476><s%> by the cross <S%G4716><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and his mother's <S%G3384><s%> sister, <S%G79><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> the wife of Cleophas, <S%G2832><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> Magdalene. <S%G3094><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> his mother, <S%G3384><s%> and the disciple <S%G3101><s%> standing <S%G3936><s%> by, whom <S%G3739><s%> he loved, <S%G25><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to his mother, <S%G3384><s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> behold <S%G2400><s%> your son! <S%G5207><s%>

Then <S%G1534><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to the disciple, <S%G3101><s%> Behold <S%G2400><s%> your mother! <S%G3384><s%> And from that hour <S%G5610><s%> that disciple <S%G3101><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> her to his own <S%G2398><s%> home. <S%G3624><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> things were now <S%G2235><s%> accomplished, <S%G5055><s%> that the scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G5048><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> I thirst. <S%G1372><s%>

Now <S%G3767><s%> there was set <S%G2749><s%> a vessel <S%G4632><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of vinegar: <S%G3690><s%> and they filled <S%G4130><s%> a sponge <S%G4699><s%> with vinegar, <S%G3690><s%> and put <S%G4060><s%> it on hyssop, <S%G5301><s%> and put <S%G4374><s%> it to his mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

When <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> had received <S%G2983><s%> the vinegar, <S%G3690><s%> he said, <S%G2036><s%> It is finished: <S%G5055><s%> and he bowed <S%G2827><s%> his head, <S%G2776><s%> and gave <S%G3860><s%> up the ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> it was the preparation, <S%G3904><s%> that the bodies <S%G4983><s%> should not remain <S%G3306><s%> on the cross <S%G4716><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day, (for that sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day was an high <S%G3173><s%> day,) sought <S%G2065><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that their legs <S%G4628><s%> might be broken, <S%G2608><s%> and that they might be taken <S%G142><s%> away.

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> the soldiers, <S%G4757><s%> and broke <S%G2608><s%> the legs <S%G4628><s%> of the first, <S%G4413><s%> and of the other <S%G243><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was crucified <S%G4957><s%> with him.
But when <S%G5613><s%> they came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> that he was dead <S%G2348><s%> already, <S%G2235><s%> they broke <S%G2608><s%> not his legs: <S%G4628><s%>

But one <S%G1520><s%> of the soldiers <S%G4757><s%> with a spear <S%G3057><s%> pierced <S%G3572><s%> his side, <S%G4125><s%> and immediately <S%G2117><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> there out blood <S%G129><s%> and water. <S%G5204><s%>

And he that saw <S%G3708><s%> it bore <S%G3140><s%> record, <S%G3140><s%> and his record <S%G3141><s%> is true: <S%G228><s%> and he knows <S%G1492><s%> that he said <S%G3004><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> that you might believe. <S%G4100><s%>
For these <S%G5023><s%> things were done, <S%G1096><s%> that the scripture <S%G1124><s%> should be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> A bone <S%G3747><s%> of him shall not be broken. <S%G4937><s%>
And again <S%G3825><s%> another <S%G2087><s%> scripture <S%G1124><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> They shall look <S%G3700><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him whom <S%G3739><s%> they pierced. <S%G1574><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> of Arimathaea, <S%G707><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> a disciple <S%G3101><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> but secretly <S%G2928><s%> for fear <S%G5401><s%> of the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2065><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> that he might take <S%G142><s%> away the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus: <S%G2424><s%> and Pilate <S%G4091><s%> gave <S%G2010><s%> him leave. <S%G2010><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And there came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> Nicodemus, <S%G3530><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> at the first <S%G4412><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> by night, <S%G3571><s%> and brought <S%G5342><s%> a mixture <S%G3395><s%> of myrrh <S%G4666><s%> and aloes, <S%G250><s%> about <S%G5616><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> pound <S%G3046><s%> weight.

Then <S%G3767><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> they the body <S%G4983><s%> of Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and wound <S%G1210><s%> it in linen <S%G3608><s%> clothes <S%G3608><s%> with the spices, <S%G759><s%> as the manner <S%G1485><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> is to bury. <S%G1779><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> in the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> he was crucified <S%G4717><s%> there was a garden; <S%G2779><s%> and in the garden <S%G2779><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> sepulcher, <S%G3419><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> was never <S%G3764><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> yet <S%G3764><s%> laid. <S%G5087><s%>

There <S%G1563><s%> laid <S%G5087><s%> they Jesus <S%G2424><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the Jews' <S%G2453><s%> preparation <S%G3904><s%> day; for the sepulcher <S%G3419><s%> was near <S%G1451><s%> at <S%G1451><s%> hand.
